body:
{"instruction": "Analyse the feature artifact and decide if geo-specific compliance logic is needed. Explain why and cite the relevant regulation if any.", "input": "Feature Name: California Do Not Sell My Personal Information Button
Feature Description: Provides California residents with a prominent button to opt-out of the sale of their personal information as required by state privacy law.

Law Context (structured JSON):
[{"law": "CCPA Section 1798.135", "jurisdiction": "US-CA", "requirement": "Right to opt-out of sale of personal information"}, {"law": "CCPA Section 1798.100", "jurisdiction": "US-CA", "requirement": "Right to know about personal information collected"}]"}
